about_text_1: I am experienced in Vue.js and Nuxt.js in which I produce high quality code for my clients that are both well performing and well tested.
about_text_2: I focus on solving problems, not only technical problems but creating an awesome experience for the users of my software both visual and accessible. Mixing powerful tools and knowledge about the users brings visual UI's to life and leads to webpages being accessible and useful.
about_text_3: I am a team player and I enjoy working in a team where we can learn from each other and grow together. I am also a fast learner and I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.
experience_job_3: Senior Frontend Developer, Test Automation Engineer and Analyst Programmer

A part of that, I also review code of pull request from different teams, including React code and update, modify or debug Java code in the backend part of the flow when it is needed.
